column1: source,"target","similarity","setnence_num_target","target_sent","source_sent";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.46351264703785,29,"We will meet, and there we may rehearse most obscenely and courageously.","And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie, Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet, There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.477113263897391,19,"Thy Thisbe dear and lady dear!”","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.488976477973534,14,"A lover is more condoling.","If then true lovers have been ever crossed, It stands as an edict in destiny.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.490256246154024,26,"Well, I will undertake it.","So will I grow, so live, so die, my lord, Ere I will yield my virgin patent up Unto his Lordship whose unwishèd yoke My soul consents not to give sovereignty.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.51205699436811,134,"I thank thee, Moon, for shining now so bright, For by thy gracious, golden, glittering gleams, I trust to take of truest Thisbe sight.","Thou art not by mine eye, Lysander, found;" Mine ear
#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.520111598475512,17,"An I may hide my face, let me play Thisbe too.","Take comfort: he no more shall see my face.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.548488828597148,129,"Think what thou wilt, I am thy lover's grace, And, like Limander, am I trusty still.","I do entreat your Grace to pardon me.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.55021447619334,51,"Stay thou but here awhile, And by and by I will to thee appear.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.558921239531687,120,"And thou, O wall, O sweet, O lovely wall, That stand'st between her father's ground and mine, Thou wall, O wall, O sweet and lovely wall, Show me thy chink to blink through with mine eyne.","Thou art not by mine eye, Lysander, found;" Mine ear
#Hermia_MND,"#Bottom_MND",0.573589713763042,107,"But ask me not what;" for
column4: Before the time I did Lysander see Seemed Athens as a paradise to me.""";;

column1: #Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.495741043497808,14,"I charge thee, hence, and do not haunt me thus.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.497136686546254,33,"Disparage not the faith thou dost not know, Lest to thy peril thou aby it dear.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.506335146897844,72,"Why, all these should be in the lanthorn, for all these are in the moon.","I'll believe as soon This whole Earth may be bored, and that the moon May through the center creep and so displease Her brother's noontide with th' Antipodes.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.514899394817252,6,"Hence, get thee gone, and follow me no more.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.531022533325011,11,"I'll run from thee and hide me in the brakes And leave thee to the mercy of wild beasts.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.534044072040183,15,"O, why rebuke you him that loves you so?","I frown upon him, yet he loves me still.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.548875300490453,3,"Where is Lysander and fair Hermia?","Before the time I did Lysander see Seemed Athens as a paradise to me.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.561824918003542,49,"Abide me, if thou dar'st, for well I wot Thou runn'st before me, shifting every place, And dar'st not stand nor look me in the face.","Thou driv'st me past the bounds Of maiden's patience.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.648884403611234,21,"I am not guilty of Lysander's blood, Nor is he dead, for aught that I can tell.","If thou hast slain Lysander in his sleep, Being o'er shoes in blood, plunge in the deep And kill me too.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Demetrius_MND",0.677961283515107,17,"So should the murdered look, and so should I, Pierced through the heart with your stern cruelty.","So should a murderer look, so dead, so grim.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.579219224325723,55,"Could not this make thee know The hate I bear thee made me leave thee so?","But why unkindly didst thou leave me so?";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.579434917147041,54,"Lysander's love, that would not let him bide, Fair Helena, who more engilds the night Than all yon fiery oes and eyes of light.","If thou hast slain Lysander in his sleep, Being o'er shoes in blood, plunge in the deep And kill me too.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.582958608198798,16,"There, gentle Hermia, may I marry thee;" And to that place the sharp Athenian law Cannot pursue us.""
column2: I know not by what power I am made bold
column3: Nor how it may concern my modesty In such a presence here to plead my thoughts";" But I beseech your Grace that I may know The worst that may befall me in this case If I refuse to wed Demetrius.""";

column1: #Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.601348270400534,70,"She shall not harm thee, Helena.","His folly, Helena, is no fault of mine.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.603374549523453,3,"My love is more than his; My fortunes every way as fairly ranked (If not with vantage) as Demetrius';" And (which is more than all these boasts can be) I am beloved of beauteous Hermia.""
column2: I know not by what power I am made bold
column3: Nor how it may concern my modesty In such a presence here to plead my thoughts";" But I beseech your Grace that I may know The worst that may befall me in this case If I refuse to wed Demetrius."""

column1: #Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.630674702641166,40,"- Hermia, sleep thou there, And never mayst thou come Lysander near.","Now much beshrew my manners and my pride If Hermia meant to say Lysander lied.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.667349790748941,74,"Where art thou, proud Demetrius?","Ah, good Demetrius, wilt thou give him me?";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.683487972245254,79,"Come, thou gentle day, For if but once thou show me thy gray light, I'll find Demetrius and revenge this spite.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.712109526848549,20,"As you on him, Demetrius dote on you!","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Lysander_MND",0.726512099883521,64,"Demetrius, I will keep my word with thee.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.57215970320429,122,"And I have found Demetrius like a jewel, Mine own and not mine own.","Ah, good Demetrius, wilt thou give him me?";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.589777495182791,56,"-  Lysander, if you live, good sir, awake.","Lysander and myself will fly this place.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.598930961987999,109,"He followed you;" for love

#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.604360152038858,91,"And wherefore doth Lysander Deny your love (so rich within his soul) And tender me, forsooth, affection, But by your setting on, by your consent?","What love could press Lysander from my side?";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.611641490897531,11,"Through Athens I am thought as fair as she.","Before the time I did Lysander see Seemed Athens as a paradise to me.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.61357987852582,44,"I'll follow thee and make a heaven of hell To die upon the hand I love so well.","O, then, what graces in my love do dwell That he hath turned a heaven unto a hell!";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.615173278130794,48,"The more my prayer, the lesser is my grace.","I do entreat your Grace to pardon me.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.620957502732606,111,"And now, so you will let me quiet go, To Athens will I bear my folly back And follow you no further.","And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie, Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet, There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.732413832481346,45,"Stay, though thou kill me, sweet Demetrius.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Helena_MND",0.736127373941103,8,"The more I love, the more he hateth me.","The more I hate, the more he follows me.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.487946876742208,11,"Your servant shall do so.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.491084520340351,47,"And so far blameless proves my enterprise That I have 'nointed an Athenian's eyes;" And so far am I glad it so did sort
column2: As this their jangling I esteem a sport.""
column3: And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie
column4: Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet
column5: There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.""";;

column1: #Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.498759487555411,46,"Did not you tell me I should know the man By the Athenian garments he had on?","And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie, Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet, There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.500570299595579,26,"Near to her close and consecrated bower, While she was in her dull and sleeping hour, A crew of patches, rude mechanicals, That work for bread upon Athenian stalls, Were met together to rehearse a play Intended for great Theseus' nuptial day.","And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie, Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet, There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.505607298587161,18,"When thou wak'st, let love forbid Sleep his seat on thy eyelid.","Take comfort: he no more shall see my face.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.507465623893938,68,"When thou wak'st, Thou tak'st True delight In the sight Of thy former lady's eye.","Thou driv'st me past the bounds Of maiden's patience.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.507842901101417,14,"This is he my master said Despisèd the Athenian maid.","And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie, Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet, There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.533144086102117,58,"He is defiled That draws a sword on thee.","Hast thou slain him, then?";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.563030442012238,80,"If you pardon, we will mend.","I do entreat your Grace to pardon me.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#RobinGoodfellow_MND",0.620617383590381,12,"Through the forest have I gone, But Athenian found I none On whose eyes I might approve This flower's force in stirring love.","And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie, Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet, There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.524019543959534,37,"What thou seest when thou dost wake Do it for thy true love take.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.534074107324032,9,"Give me that boy and I will go with thee.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.541770829379912,45,"This is the same Athenian.","Before the time I did Lysander see Seemed Athens as a paradise to me.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.561637081947667,54,"-  When thou wak'st, if she be by, Beg of her for remedy.","Thou driv'st me past the bounds Of maiden's patience.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.571719603170526,31,"Take thou some of it, and seek through this grove.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.573425999141272,44,"But hast thou yet latched the Athenian's eyes With the love juice, as I did bid thee do?","And in the wood where often you and I Upon faint primrose beds were wont to lie, Emptying our bosoms of their counsel sweet, There my Lysander and myself shall meet And thence from Athens turn away our eyes To seek new friends and stranger companies.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.578150249661688,59,"Like to Lysander sometime frame thy tongue;" Then stir Demetrius up with bitter wrong.""
column2: If thou hast slain Lysander in his sleep
column4: plunge in the deep And kill me too.""";;

column1: #Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.595678744971232,26,"I pray thee give it me.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.600986953734037,10,"Thou shalt not from this grove Till I torment thee for this injury.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Oberon_MND",0.641687734397447,60,"And sometime rail thou like Demetrius.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.459864823205429,31,"Thou shalt remain here whether thou wilt or no.","So will I grow, so live, so die, my lord, Ere I will yield my virgin patent up Unto his Lordship whose unwishèd yoke My soul consents not to give sovereignty.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.468105343508124,4,"Why art thou here, Come from the farthest steep of India, But that, forsooth, the bouncing Amazon, Your buskined mistress and your warrior love, To Theseus must be wedded, and you come To give their bed joy and prosperity?","Then let us teach our trial patience Because it is a customary cross, As due to love as thoughts and dreams and sighs, Wishes and tears, poor fancy's followers.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.477633765822555,28,"Mine ear is much enamored of thy note, So is mine eye enthrallèd to thy shape, And thy fair virtue's force perforce doth move me On the first view to say, to swear, I love thee.","My good Lysander, I swear to thee by Cupid's strongest bow, By his best arrow with the golden head, By the simplicity of Venus' doves, By that which knitteth souls and prospers loves, And by that fire which burned the Carthage queen When the false Trojan under sail was seen, By all the vows that ever men have broke (In number more than ever women spoke), In that same place thou hast appointed me, Tomorrow truly will I meet with thee.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.479707256231487,34,"I'll give thee fairies to attend on thee, And they shall fetch thee jewels from the deep And sing while thou on pressèd flowers dost sleep.","My good Lysander, I swear to thee by Cupid's strongest bow, By his best arrow with the golden head, By the simplicity of Venus' doves, By that which knitteth souls and prospers loves, And by that fire which burned the Carthage queen When the false Trojan under sail was seen, By all the vows that ever men have broke (In number more than ever women spoke), In that same place thou hast appointed me, Tomorrow truly will I meet with thee.";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.484770521620679,50,"O, how I love thee!","My good Lysander, I swear to thee by Cupid's strongest bow, By his best arrow with the golden head, By the simplicity of Venus' doves, By that which knitteth souls and prospers loves, And by that fire which burned the Carthage queen When the false Trojan under sail was seen, By all the vows that ever men have broke (In number more than ever women spoke), In that same place thou hast appointed me, Tomorrow truly will I meet with thee.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.498801750361711,47,"Sleep thou, and I will wind thee in my arms.","And hast thou killed him sleeping?";;;

#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.499112036345554,35,"And I will purge thy mortal grossness so That thou shalt like an airy spirit go.","So will I grow, so live, so die, my lord, Ere I will yield my virgin patent up Unto his Lordship whose unwishèd yoke My soul consents not to give sovereignty.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.521742164550964,29,"Thou art as wise as thou art beautiful.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.543570329027764,51,"How I dote on thee!","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
#Hermia_MND,"#Titania_MND",0.600412752924336,27,"I pray thee, gentle mortal, sing again.","Pray thou for us, And good luck grant thee thy Demetrius.";;;
